name: Oak In The Wind
description:
Catch the falling leaves in this simple autumn-themed game! Sound on <3  Game concept inspired by Ashyra's A Tower and Some Leaves.

Sorry for the oversized aspect ratio! Zoom out on your browser for a better experience.

Made in ~15 hours for the utGDDC 2022 Fall Game Jam! The theme was, well, "The Fall".

Controls:

A - move left

D - move right

SPACE - jump

SHIFT - lower basket

Credits:

Art, Music, Scripting - Ramy
